title: Koszul cohomology
summary: In mathematics, the Koszul cohomology groups K p , q ( X , L ) {\displaystyle K_{p,q}(X,L)} are groups associated to a projective variety X with a line bundle L. They were introduced by Mark GreenÂ (1984, 1984b), and named after Jean-Louis Koszul as they are closely related to the Koszul complex.
